alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Crittenden; Cross; Poinsett; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 3:51AM CDT until June 18 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Craighead County in eastern Arkansas... Northern St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas... Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Cross County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 350 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jacksonport to near Algoa to near Fair Oaks, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, West Memphis, Marion, Wynne, Trumann, Marked Tree, Earle, Harrisburg, Lake City, Lepanto, Bay, Brookland, Parkin, Tyronza, Village Creek State Park, Weiner, Cherry Valley, Caldwell, Crawfordsville and Edmondson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Craighead; Crittenden; Cross; Poinsett; St. Francis
